description_translations.en: Template to prepare a form to collect consent from participants engaged in research activities about the use of their personal data
description_translations.es: Plantilla para preparar un formulario para recoger el consentimiento de los participantes en actividades de investigación sobre el uso de sus datos personales
description_translations.it: Modello per preparare un modulo per raccogliere il consenso dei partecipanti impegnati in attività di ricerca sull'uso dei loro dati personali
description_translations.lv: Veidlapa pētnieciskajās aktivitātēs iesaistīto dalībnieku piekrišanas formas personīgo datu izmantošanai sagatavošanai

regulations_and_standards_translations.en: The consent form is compliant to GDPR norms.
